title: WRC 7 FIA World Rally Championship – v1.4 + Porsche DLC
body:
WRC 7 FIA World Rally Championship – v1.4 + Porsche DLC


Genres/Tags: Racing, Rally, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Kylotonn Entertainment / Bigben Interactive
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 19.2 GB
Repack Size: 10.5 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Good Old Downloads (NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on WRC 7 v1.4 Steam release: 19.1 GB
  • WRC.7.V1.4.Crack.Only-Voksi with CODEX emulator (112 MB) applied over
  • Porsche DLC included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 19.2 to 10.5 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~15 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~25 minutes on 4-threads CPU; ~40 minutes on 2-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 20 GB (~22 GB during installation)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • If the game crashes for you with Denuvo error, just relaunch it

Game Description

Take on all the challenges of the 2017 World Rally Championship: the official cars and drivers, 13 countries, 52 Special Stages, every surface, more powerful cars, more demanding physics, longer races, and an eSports mode to keep you on the edge of your seat all year round. Choose among cars from prestigious manufacturers such as Hyundai, Toyota, Citroen, and Ford, perfectly recreated for a realistic driving experience. 55 official teams are available, including a large selection of WRC 2 and WRC Junior drivers. The 13 Epic Stages offer an unprecedented gaming experience with special stages that last more than 15 minutes: the ultimate endurance test for both drivers and WRC fans!

Game Features

  • New physics bring to life all the power of the WRC 2017 cars
  • Completely overhauled tracks provide an ultra-realistic driving experience
  • Local split screen multiplayer

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS HEAVILY backwards compatible with my initial repack of this game. Only setup.exe and fg-09.bin has been changed. All other files can be rehashed.
